rows.label: bf04330100_0010
rows.name: H-how can you be so strong...?!

rows.label: bf04330100_0020
rows.name:
Now, we're going to need some answers.
What were you people plotting here?

rows.label: bf04330100_0030
rows.name: O-ordinary business!

rows.label: bf04330100_0040
rows.name:
We innocently mass-produce ether furnaces and artificial
Blades, and sell to people who want them!

rows.label: bf04330100_0050
rows.name:
They threaten Tatezo, and force to
participate in production process...

rows.label: bf04330100_0060
rows.name: Dadapon...

rows.label: bf04330100_0070
rows.name:
And next you wanted to get your hands
on Hana? You are a greedy bunch.

rows.label: bf04330100_0080
rows.name: I knew as soon as I saw her!

rows.label: bf04330100_0090
rows.name:
That artificial Blade uses lost ether
furnace designed by Professor Senzo!

rows.label: bf04330100_0100
rows.name: That is why...

rows.label: bf04330100_0110
rows.name:
You quite right. Even I could never make
such incredible furnace as my own dadapon.

rows.label: bf04330100_0120
rows.name:
...So you lured us out here to avoid
making a ruckus in the city, is that it?

rows.label: bf04330100_0130
rows.name: Qu-quite right, yes...

rows.label: bf04330100_0140
rows.name:
Muimui was part of group plotting
to steal artificial Blades all along.

rows.label: bf04330100_0150
rows.name:
While he my Dadapon's assistant, he sell information to
contact in Guild and had them attack laboratory...

rows.label: bf04330100_0160
rows.name:
What?! Then it all his fault that
Grampypon was killed?!

rows.label: bf04330100_0170
rows.name: Indeed it was.

rows.label: bf04330100_0180
rows.name:
A contact in the Guild...
Could it be that the one behind all this is...

rows.label: bf04330100_0190
rows.name: Indeed, it is I.

rows.label: bf04330100_0200
rows.name: M-Master Bahn!

rows.label: bf04330100_0210
rows.name: You never do finish job properly, do you?

rows.label: bf04330100_0220
rows.name:
You manage to lure them all this way
and then fail to capture them?

rows.label: bf04330100_0230
rows.name: Muimui very sorry...

rows.label: bf04330100_0240
rows.name: But I am nice Nopon.

rows.label: bf04330100_0250
rows.name:
You brought not only artificial Blade
to me, but even the Holy Grail itself!

rows.label: bf04330100_0260
rows.name: Once I have ether furnace of Professor Senzo...

rows.label: bf04330100_0265
rows.name:
I can produce even better artificial
Blades and make a killing!

rows.label: bf04330100_0270
rows.name:
Then I sell Holy Grail too and make
mountains of cash!

rows.label: bf04330100_0280
rows.name: Then I can feast on Mushy Mushrooms for life!

rows.label: bf04330100_0290
rows.name: Chairman Bahn! I can't believe you would stoop to this!

rows.label: bf04330100_0300
rows.name:
You should show more respect after
all the valuable work I find for you.

rows.label: bf04330100_0310
rows.name:
So who are you planning to sell the
Holy Grail to, anyway? Iira, I suppose?!

rows.label: bf04330100_0320
rows.name: How you know about Iira?!

rows.label: bf04330100_0330
rows.name:
Wait, I remember you!
You one of Iira's Drivers!

rows.label: bf04330100_0340
rows.name: Wh-wh-what you doing here?!

rows.label: bf04330100_0350
rows.name:
If you come for ether furnaces,
they ready in ship outside.

rows.label: bf04330100_0360
rows.name: What?! You're selling THOSE to Iira as well?!

rows.label: bf04330100_0370
rows.name:
Not sure what is going on,
but I will just beat you all up.

rows.label: bf04330100_0380
rows.name: Kiku! Take them all down!

rows.label: bf04330100_0390
rows.name: Mission acknowledged. Commencing combat.

rows.label: bf04330100_0400
rows.name: Tora, please destroy her for me.

rows.label: bf04330100_0410
rows.name:
Muimui modified her so she not even
listen to Masterpon Tatezo any more!

rows.label: bf04330100_0420
rows.name:
Dadapon... All right!
Come on, Hana!

rows.label: bf04330100_0430
rows.name: As you wish, Masterpon!
